name: Squirrel (eviljake29)
description:
Controls 'W' - Jump'Space' - Jump'A' - Left'D' - Right'LMB' - Hit Iceberg'RMB' - Use Acorn on Iceberg'S' - Dig for acorns Instructions

You are a squirrel trying to bring Spring into the world, but Winter is persistent. Break icebergs by clicking on them with 'LMB', or destroy them instantly with acorns by clicking 'RMB'. Dig for acorns with 'S'. Move left and right with 'A' and 'D' respectively. 

Icebergs

Icebergs are randomly generated, and have a random amount of health from 1 - 50. Breaking them grows the Spring area based on how much health the iceberg had. By using an acorn you can destroy any iceberg in one click (Using 'RMB').

Acorns

Dig for acorns with 'S'. Your total acorns are shown in the top left below your score.  There is a 1/6 chance of getting an acorn, every time you dig.

Cold

Going outside the sphere of spring, you will be faced with the cold of winter. Watch the blue bar below your character. Once this bar passes halfway your squirrel will be slower due to the cold. When it's full you will die.
